author: admin
title: Eastern Railway Recruitment 2017 House Surgeon Jobs Advertisement Apply
text: 01 What will be the required eligibility Criteria ? Applying aspirants must possess Degree of Medical Graduates (MBBS) with one year internship from a recognized University/ Institutions. Check Now: Latest Jobs in Medical Sector Match your age limit with required : Candidates who are going to apply for Eastern Railway Vacancy must meet age- criteria according to the posts per discipline as per norms. Upper age limit can be relaxed for reserved category as per rules of organization. Eastern Railway Recruitment Official Notification: Get PDF Check the monthly remuneration : Appointed appliers for these job openings in government sector will get an impressive amount of Rs. 26959/- per month from the concerned department of reputed organization. Mode to get hired : To get recruited for available vacancies, appliers have to undergo Interview which will be organized by the recruitment panel of Eastern Railway. Go Through Below Given Articles To Grab This Opportunity:
